resources.string: Google Play services is not available. This application will close.
Flat C-6,Rams Vedasreni Apartments,Velachery Main Road , Velachery, Chennai, Pincode - 600042

Thedreamstop is a mobile grocery application that makes your shopping experience easier and
hassle-free were we create the best online buying experience for you by brining you the best
offers and products from trusted local stores. We know how big a pain grocery shopping can be,
and how we all dislike going to the store now the products you orders are delivered in less than 6
hours, you pay only when you are satisfied with the product ordered and a no question asked
return policy. Isn’t it great!!!!

What are our service areas?\n
We serve in Nagpur and Chennai. Follow us on Facebook and Twitter to be updated about our
services.
\nWhat is the minimum order value?\n
There is no minimum order value.
\nAre there any Delivery Costs?\n
We deem to provide great service, and good things always come with a cost (and they should).
Only here in our case it\’s quite minimal. Free delivery on orders above Rs 250. Rs 50 for orders
below that.
\nHow fast can you deliver?\n
Keeping the fast paced lives today and emergencies in mind, we wish to deliver your order
ASAP. In our case the maximum time limit would be 2 hours, but we would want to reach your
doorstep sooner.
\nCan I change the delivery address of my order?\n
You cannot change the delivery address once the order is placed. You can cancel the previous
order and place a new one.
\nHow can I pay you?\n
Right now we only accept payments via \'Cash on Delivery\', but soon we will make other methods
available (Credit/Debit Card on Delivery, online payment).
\nI had an issue with your service, who do I get in touch with?\n
We take pride not only in our service but also of the fact that we can make our customers happy
and satisfied. We will revert back almost instantly and resolve the issue in the least possible time.
Click here to view our contact details.
\nWhat if I want to cancel my order?\n
You can cancel your order any time before the order is out for delivery.
\nI want to reschedule my order what should I do?\n
At the moment you cannot reschedule your order once it\’s placed. You can cancel your existing
order and place a new order with the required delivery time.
\nWhat if I have some complaint regarding my order?\n
You can contact us within 24 hrs from the time of order delivery, if you have any.
\nWhat if I want to return something?\n
At the time of delivery, return what you think is unacceptable.
